text: Tamen zhi dengdai na bu jingdian de xiaoguo, ta de xiaoguo daolai de rizi, congqian wangji zhe jingdian de ren jiang hui shuo:`Women de zhu de zhong shizhe, que yi zhaoshi zhenlile! Women you ji wei shuo qing de ren lai ti women shuo qing, huo zhun women fanhui chenshi qu, she zui'e erli shangong ma?'Tamen que yi kui she le zishen, tamen suo niezao de shi yi huibi tamenle.
